{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-14T20:21:42.000Z", "description": "

Job Title:  Software Engineer in Test


Location: Alpharetta, Georgia (Flexible/Hybrid)

Industry: Supply Chain

Terms: Permanent

Requirements: Javascript

Preferred: 

  • Jest or Jasmin 
  • Chai (for assertions)
  • Typescript or JavaScript 
  • Visual Studio Code editor


SDET Job Summary:

Our client is looking for a strong, Software Development Engineer in Test to join its Quality Assurance team. This will be a vital role to the team and the candidate must be self-driven, motivated, and passionate about tackling their next challenge! This role will report to the VP of Solutions and Quality and will have autonomy and decision making responsibilities. 


SDET Job Responsibilities:

  • Participate in requirement meetings and project-related meetings to gain a thorough understanding of project goals and objectives
  • Analyze project requirements, identifying gaps and ensuring acceptability for test case creation
  • Own and develop automated testing tools for our omnichannel suite of solutions
  • Utilize automated testing tools for the RESTFUL service tied to marketplace integrations
  • Identify specific use cases tied to the individual marketplaces and assist in testing those manually as needed, while working on the longer-term automated solution
  • Develop automated acceptance and unit test for the agile team
  • Work with Jenkins and CI tools to automate development, building, deployment, and testing
  • Be a part of the Scrum team and work closely with product owners to understand the requirements
  • Analyze test results from a technical standpoint and provide detailed analysis to technology team
  • Test related support for production issue troubleshooting in collaboration with Dev
  • Develop all test artifacts required as part of the QA deliverables such as test plans, test scripts, strategy, RTM documents, etc.


SDET Job Requirements:

  • Four-year degree in Computer Science/Engineering preferred
  • 2+ years experience in software quality testing
  •  2+ years of Agile Experience
  • 3 years Java Experience preferred
  • Experience in integration platforms preferred
  • Detailed knowledge of all aspects of the Software Development Life Cycle including requirements gathering, design, and testing with experience using current testing methodologies and tool
  • Working knowledge on JSON and XML messaging
  • Experience with Atlassian tools like JIRA, Confluence, and etc.
  • Experience developing in agile & with CI tools like GitHub
  • Relational database understanding with the ability to query MySQL database to verify the test results
  • Exposure/working knowledge with Restful automation tools - JMeter/SoapUI/Other
  • Knowledge and understanding of at least one OOP language, scripting language a plus
  • Ability to work independently and with a team in a fast-paced and dynamic company environment under tight deadlines
  • Excellent analytical and organizational skills with the ability to multitask on multiple projects at one time
  • Strong individual initiative and ownership of projects and quality testing tasks

Plus: 

  • Jest or Jasmin
  • Chai (for assertions)
  • Typescript or JavaScript 
  • Visual Studio Code editor


Job Key Words:

  • SDET, Software Engineer in Test, QA, Javascript


Frequently Asked Questions:

  • Benefits? Yes, provided the client
  • Remote Workers? Allows for 2-3 days per week remote 
  • Visa Sponsorship? Not offered 
  • Corp-to-Corp? Not eligible 


How to Apply:

For immediate attention please apply online.
